name: The future class president (MOD APK ONLY)
name_original: The future class president (MOD APK ONLY)
description:
WARNING: This game is not suitable for ages 0-6.

The future president!!!!

A 15 year old Girl named Cammi-chan-desu is the main character and Miyuki-san and Miyuki-Kun are the protagonist of the game.

Miyuki-san and Miyuki-kun came to the classroom and voted but….They had to go home soon because their mother Roba Nessano was going to pick them up from school. But she got revenge……And so……She pulled out a shot to get their vaccine. That is a poisoned vaccine needle. When you get slaved you’ll have to shot others and get to go to a forgotten pool named PROJECT CAMMI.
